mean_cn: adj. 违反常情的；邪恶的
mean_en: showing deliberate determination to behave in a way that most people think is wrong, unacceptable or unreasonable
sentence: The fish is being deliberately perverse to swim to an opposite direction.
sentence_trans: 这条鱼故意反常地游向相反的方向。
word_etyma: per贯穿，自始自终 ＋ verse=vers转 → 和大家始终反着转 → perverse性情乖张的
